column5: Hey Joe, I hope you have a great day!!!!  Keep an eye out for flying paintballs though  Maureen

Happy day to you Joe! How's the motorcycle project coming along? Let's have a few pics of your holiday. It's nice when your birthday falls on a weekend cause you can generally get a few hours of R&R then. Have a good one my friend!
All the very best to you Joe!
Happy B-Day bud, hope ya have a goodun  !!
have a great day
All the best my friend. I was going to send you a package but Brook wouldn't let me seal her up in the box.
Happy Birthday Coonass!!!  Have that Hottie Miss Becky cook you up some red beans and rice for supper!!!  Have a great day Bubba!!!
Hope ya have a great one Joe.
All the Best Joe...
Thanx guys,I've been relaxing all weekend in bed with a cold. Joe
Happy Birthday
Too bad about the cold, Joe.  Just let Becky fuss over you.  Hope you are feeling better soon.
A burnt motor oil and Tabasco sauce enema will take that cold right out of you Bubba!!!  ... it's an old Cajun remedy!
happy birthday to you Joe.... hurry up and get well  Art
Happy Birthday Joe !
Happy Birthday you old Coona$$.    All the best.     Get well soon too.   Looks like some nasty weather may be in store for you.
Have a Happy Birthday Joe. Hope your cold is gone soon.  Did you try Coach's remedy yet?

Yanno Joe, fer a healthy lookin' dude you seem to get sick a lot. Is it the diet maybe? Are the goats sick? Here's a pick me up tune fer ya Bubba.   <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="
Happy birthday Joe Hope you're feeling better by now! Leechman
Happy Birthday !!
Happy Birthday Joe.  Sorry to hear about the cold.  A good hot toddy will fix that right up  Joey
Happy Birthday Joe!
Happy BDAY!...
Happy Bday
Belated Happy Birthday....
